pages.text: Using the power contained in the Gems Ancient Mages found they could combine them with regular items to form liquids.$(br)$(br)These liquids can be used to quickly change the world around you.$(br)$(li)Liquid Fire$(li)Liquid Grass Block$(li)Liquid Water Source
Liquid Fire can be used to quickly set fire to blocks it touches.
Liquid Grass can quickly cover a large area in grass blocks.

pages.title: Liquid Water Source
pages.text: Liquid Water Source can be used to quickly fill a large area with water.
